paramInformation.label: Power Factor Delta Based Configuration
paramInformation.description: This configuration parameter will be used to enable/disable the delta base power factor reporting in 0.1% resolution.  if user wants to set power factor 10% = 10/0.1 = 100

paramInformation.label: Relay and LED Configuration
paramInformation.description: This configuration is used to change the relay LED status when relay is open/close and also enable to whether to retain the last relay status over power cycle

options.label: Relay status will not be retain over power cycle, and relay status LED will lit when relay on and relay status LED will off when relay off"
Relay status will be retain over power cycle, and relay status LED will lit when relay on and relay status LED will off when relay off
Relay status will not be retain over power cycle, and relay status LED will off when relay on and relay status LED will lit when relay off
Relay status will be retain over power cycle, and relay status LED will off when relay on and relay status LED will lit when relay off

metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release. The LED flashes twice per second during the process and turns off when successful.
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release. The LED flashes twice per second during the process, then once per second when successful.
metadata.reset:
1. Power cycle the device
2. Press and hold the button for 11-15 seconds within 60 seconds of power cycle
